dialog.speaker: Bertrand_Fallbrook (Male)
dialog.utterance: Damn it all! Now look what you've done! It'll take me ages to round 'em up again.

dialog.speaker: Bertrand_Fallbrook (Male)
dialog.utterance: State your purpose or get out of my face, domicile-intruder!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm looking for some missing sprats. You wouldn't have seen any... around?

dialog.speaker: Bertrand_Fallbrook (Male)
dialog.utterance: Missing? Nope, nope... Mine are all found and accounted for, thank you kindly. Now if that'll be all...

dialog.speaker: Bertrand_Fallbrook (Male)
dialog.utterance: I've got an animal rescue service to oversee, and it ain't easy. Lots to do. Got a multitude of sprats to spay and feed.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: These sprats you stole are drug carriers. I'm here to retrieve the goods.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Rescue sprats. As in rescued from SubLight's shipping tunnels?

dialog.speaker: Bertrand_Fallbrook (Male)
dialog.utterance: Look, I don't care if Nelson sent you or not. You won't be hurting a hair on any of these sprats' heads. I've killed vicious beasts for them. I ain't afraid to take on a human.

dialog.speaker: Bertrand_Fallbrook (Male)
dialog.utterance: Back out of this domicile, hands up, or become sprat food, intruder.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I won't hurt your sprats. The drugs have probably passed through their digestive tracts already.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: No need for vivisection. Sprats possess rapid digestive systems.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> Sounds like an extermination's in order.

dialog.speaker: Bertrand_Fallbrook (Male)
dialog.utterance: You want to dig through sprat droppings, be my guest. Get your drugs. Then get lost.

dialog.speaker: Bertrand_Fallbrook (Male)
dialog.utterance: Day in, day out, they ran their little route, getting picked off along the way! What was I to do, turn a blind eye? Malin's an animal lover. She won't hold my actions against me.
